XPrepro.Dakota:
environment tabular_data tabular_data_file 'dakota.dat'
method sampling sample_type lhs samples 50 seed 3412 distribution cumulative variance_based_decomp
model single
interface analysis_drivers = 'run_dshell_protocol' fork parameters_file = 'delta_Parameters.inc' results_file = 'analysis_Results.out' work_directory named 'work' directory_tag copy_files 'template/*' failure_capture recover = asynchronous evaluation_concurrency =
no_gradients no_hessians
